meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>intention</kanji> for your <kanji>hope</kanji> is what you want. It's not just a hope. You have intention behind it. This is your <vocabulary>desire</vocabulary>. This is your <vocabulary>ambition</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
